name: DeferredContent
description: DeferredContent postpones the loading the content that is initially not in the viewport until it becomes visible on scroll.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

events.name: load
events.title: Callback to invoke when deferred content is loaded..
